oai_dc:dc.dc:title: NEW CRITERIA FOR GRANULAR FILTERS AND GEOTEXTILE FILTERS UNDER REVETMENTS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bakker, K.J.
Breteler, M. Klein
der Adel, H.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: granular filter
geotextile filter
revetment
revetment filter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: New criteria for the design of filters under revetments are introduced and verification tests are described. These criteria are based on a hydrodynamic limit instead of the usual geometric limit, assuming a similarity between the flow in open channels and flow in the pores at an interface between filter and base. First a theory was developed for a granular filter only, and later this theory was extended to include the influence of a geotextile. The verification experiments are outlined, and the applicability of the derived formulae is discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
